Articles.Content:
What I need is a contracts pack that is sorted one contract per planetary body, and each contract has a list of every possible experiment that can be performed on/around such body.

Just like the stock survey contracts do it. They have each "mini objective" that has to be done in order to get paid. I need that except with every possible scientific experiment that can be performed for that body in place of these "mini objectives".

On 28/10/2016 at 8:50 PM, Red Iron Crown said:

Moved to Add-on Discussions.

Huh. Thought I posted it there. I must have been really tired.
